Description: The FHIR Medication resource defines detailed information about a medication order's product or package. The Medication resource is not specific to any patient.
SampleResponse:
<Medication xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="eci..pW5ztKFF7MFf2b4au.fYRPVsgvKGwVb7yH7tEEeDWXW2jIBTMKBfZZSr1k-g3" />

<code>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.68" />

<code value="88350065102050" />

</coding>

<coding>

<system value="http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm" />

<code value="1010739" />

</coding>

<text value="lidocaine (XYLOCAINE) 2% viscous solution" />

</code>

<isBrand value="false" />

<isOverTheCounter value="false" />

<form>

<coding>

<system value="1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.4.698288.310" />

<code value="SOLN" />

<display value="Solution" />

</coding>

<text value="Solution" />

</form>

</Medication>

code.Name: code
code.Description:
Codes that identify this medication.

Supports GPK, HPK, and PRK codes in Netherlands environments.

description.Name: extension
description.Description: The name of a medication. Always provides the clinician-facing name. This element is used only by organizations in the Netherlands. This element is populated only if the Code element is not populated.

form.Name: form
form.Description: This is the form a dose can take, such as tablets or powder.

amount.Name: amount
amount.Description: For medications that have a total volume or are IMS mixtures, this is the quantity of an ingredient present compared to the overall quantity of the mixture.

itemCodeableConcept.Name: itemCodeableConcept
itemCodeableConcept.Description:
This element is used only with mixture components or single ingredient, non-mixture medications.

Supports GPK, HPK, and PRK codes in Netherlands environments.

itemReference.Name: itemReference
itemReference.Description: This element is used only with mixture medications. It is a reference to a substance or medication.

isBrand.Name: isBrand
isBrand.Description: This element is true if this is a brand-name medication.

isOverTheCounter.Name: isOverTheCounter
isOverTheCounter.Description: This element is true if this medication doesn't require a prescription.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Product
